description:
We are India’s Most Trusted Medical and Pharmacy App for Online Medicines, Lab Tests & Doctor Consultation

Apollo 24|7 is the best online consultation, diagnostic, and pharmacy app that gives you access to various medical and healthcare services via a single platform. With the Apollo 24|7 app, you can book online and offline doctor consultations, and diagnostic lab tests, and get online medicine delivery seamlessly at the most affordable prices. Apollo 24|7 has now launched 19-minute medicine delivery in Delhi NCR, Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Kolkata. Get 75,000+ medicines and essentials delivered lighting-fast right to your doorstep!

Order Medicines Online

With Apollo 24|7, you can stop worrying about standing in long queues outside pharmacies for medicines. Unlike other medical apps, our pharmacy app offers you swift delivery of medicines and health products at your doorstep. Apollo 24|7 has launched a 19-minute medicine delivery in Delhi NCR, Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Kolkata! 

Furthermore, you can order medicines, health products, OTC supplements, and various other types of medical items from renowned brands like Dabur, Himalaya, Accu-Chek, and Omron, among others. We offer online medicine delivery services in almost every major city across India. 

Avail Lab Tests at Home

Apart from getting medicine delivery, you can also use the Apollo 24|7 pharmacy app to book diagnostic tests conveniently. Thanks to the seamless integration of Apollo Diagnostics with Apollo 24|7, you can now undergo diagnostic tests at home. Besides getting regular updates about the progress of the diagnostic evaluation, you can also expect to receive test reports in no time. With Apollo 24|7, you get the lab tests at affordable prices. You can rely on the best lab technicians from Apollo Diagnostic to deliver only the most accurate reports.

Benefits of Booking Lab Tests from Apollo 24|7 Healthcare App

*Accurate diagnostic tests at affordable prices
*Rigid external internal quality examination
*Easy and convenient online lab test booking

Packages - Diagnostic Tests

*Heart test package
*Best health checkup packages
*Women's health check up packages
*Diabetic profile test

Online Doctor Consultations

The Apollo 24|7 medicine app brings at your disposal the entire spectrum of services offered by the Apollo Hospitals group. The app gives you access to over 2200 doctors specializing in more than 55 specialties. You can also book physical appointments with doctors and specialists from Apollo Hospitals, Apollo Clinics, Apollo Spectra, Apollo Cradle, Apollo Fertility, Apollo Sugar, and Apollo Dental. After consultation, the physician will share a diagnosis on the app itself and you can use it to avail of medicine delivery from our online medical store.

Additional Features and Services:

* Ask Apollo (Symptoms Checker) - A useful application backed by AI to help evaluate your symptoms for various conditions
* Medical & Healthcare Oriented Blogs - Informational content pieces to help you to stay on top of latest health news
* Glucose Tracking - Apollo 247 app also integrates with leading Glucose Monitoring devices in India. You can track your glucose readings on Apollo 247 app.

Disclaimer:   Please consult a doctor in addition to using the Glucose tracking feature on Apollo 247 before making any medical decisions. 

Some of the doctor specialties that you can avail on the Apollo 24|7 medicine and pharmacy app:

*General Physicians - Common Cold & Cough and Fever
*Paediatricians - Child Nutrition, Growth & Development
*Gynaecologists - Irregular Periods, PCOS & Pregnancy
*Dermatologists – Hair Loss & Acne
*Dietitians - Weight Loss, Weight Gain

If you intend to source all your healthcare and medicine requirements from a trusted healthcare app, download Apollo 24|7 app today and become a part of 10 million and growing family of Apollo 24|7 users.

You can also find us on www.apollo247.com

Co-developed by Apollo Healthco and Apollo Pharmacy Limited

Tata 1mg is India's leading & most trusted healthcare platform. Be it medicines, health products, medicine info, lab tests, doctors consultation, the Tata 1mg app provides it all.
We are active in 1000+ cities including Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Pune, Bangalore, Kolkata & more. Order medicines online & get same-day safe delivery at home in select cities.

With Tata 1mg, you can
•	Buy genuine medicines & health products
•	Get medicine information vetted by doctors
•	Book lab tests
•	Consult doctors online
•	Get health tips & educational content from experts

Save on Medicine Bills
There are 2 lakh+ allopathy medicines available at best prices on our medicine app. Tata 1mg is a one-stop destination for Homeopathy & Ayurvedic medicines, medical devices, health supplements, personal hygiene products & brands like Dabur, Himalaya, SBL Homeopathy, Accu-Chek & more. All products sold are 100% genuine and procured from verified & licensed pharmacies only.
Don't want to go through the hassle of adding each medicine separately? Just upload prescription on the app & we'll place the order for you.


Book Health Check-ups & Lab Tests 
Get tested safely from home & get best discounts on blood tests, thyroid tests, diabetes tests & more. Test samples are collected by highly trained & experienced phlebotomists. Book from over 2,000 tests by 120+ top verified labs such as Dr Lal Path Labs, SRL Diagnostics, Thyrocare & more via Tata 1mg. Get free home sample-collection & online reports.

Consult India’s Best Doctors Online
Tata 1mg allows you to consult doctors online from home. Chat privately with registered medical specialists. Find doctors & book appointments with General Physicians, Gynaecologists, Dermatologists & more specialities. Doctors registered on Tata 1mg undergo a strict onboarding and verification process.

View Medicine Information
We provide accurate, authoritative & trustworthy information on medicine to help people use their medicines safely. Access other medicine information like treatment, usage, side effects, recommendations, safety warnings, expert advice & answers to patient FAQs.

Read Regular Health Tips
Get useful health tips written by expert doctors like Ayurveda & its benefits, maintaining personal hygiene, & other relevant topics.

Awards & Recognition:
Our goal is to make healthcare understandable, accessible & affordable. We set out on our journey in 2015 & have come a long way since. We have been conferred with prestigious titles like:
•	BML Munjal Award for 'Business Excellence through Learning & Development'
•	Best Online Pharmacy in India Award
•	Top 50 venture in The Smart CEO-Startup50 India
•	India's only ISO/IEC 27001 & LegitScript certified online healthcare platform
•	VC Circle Award for the "Most promising Healthcare startup
•	BMW Simply Unstoppable Award, 2019
•	ABP News 'Healthcare Leadership Award’ at World Marketing Congress, 2019
•	IMC Awards for Excellence, 2019 for ‘Best Mobile Innovation for Health’

* We were also recognized by the Government of India - Ministry of Health & Family Welfare as an m-health initiative that consumers can use.
* We have been selected as the only company from across the globe for SD#3 "Health & Well Being for all" by Unreasonable Group, US State Department

Permissions Explained
Photos/Media/Files: To store & retrieve your uploads
Camera: To allow you to take a photo & directly upload it to the app
Location: To know about your current location & show you the services available in your area

Disclaimer
DOCTOR-PATIENT RELATIONSHIP: Tata 1mg does not replace your relationship with a physician or healthcare provider. The information SHOULD NOT be relied upon as a substitute for sound professional medical advice, evaluation or care from your physician or other qualified healthcare provider.

Please note: This application is currently available for download exclusively in India and the United States.

The National Health Authority (NHA) under its flagship scheme of Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission (ABDM) has revamped the Ayushman Bharat Health Account (ABHA) mobile application of the Government of India (GoI) with a new User Interface (UI) and new functionalities. This will enable the Indian citizens to do easy registration of ABHA address (username@abdm). ABHA Mobile application provides the individuals with a longitudinal view of health records with an option to link and share post user consent through ABDM network of different health facilities and providers. Existing & New Functionalities (with all new simple & intuitive UI design)

. Create an easy to remember ABHA Address (username@abdm) with mobile number, email ID or ABHA number.

. Link ABHA address with 14digit ABHA number to become KYC verified and

utilize benefits of government health programs.

. Discover health facilities to link, view and manage health records by citizens.

. Access health records such as lab reports, prescriptions, CoWIN vaccination certificates

etc.

. Share health records with registered doctors, health facilities or health programs.

. Own and Control access of your health records in terms of who can access, what type of health information can be accessed and for what duration.

. Option to revoke consent to stop sharing of your health records after granting consent.

. Option to Edit Profile details including address and update the mobile no or email with respective OTP validation. 

. Scan QR code at the counter of the ABDM compliant facility for express registration. ABHA Mobile application is currently available in Hindi and English and would soon be available in other languages. For better user experience, you are requested to kindly update all new “ABHA App” with new

features and enhancements. You may now create ABHA Address using multiple options via Mobile Number, Email ID or 14-digit ABHA Number. You may also link and share your records post your consent.

Truemeds: Your Pocket-Friendly Path To Wellness

Are you tired of spending huge amounts of money on your monthly medicine stock, wondering if there’s a way to get the same medicines at affordable prices? Well, worry no more. Truemeds has got you covered!

Truemeds is an E-Pharmacy trusted by over 1.1 Cr+ Indians for their daily medicine  & healthcare needs. We are an all-in-one app that offers branded medicines, healthcare products & FDA & GMP-certified generic medicines at affordable rates. With our technology-driven platform, we aim to make essential medicines easily accessible &reduce healthcare expenses.

Shopping for medicines & wellness products on our tele-health platform is a truly rewarding experience. You can easily:

→ Get flat 25% off using the coupon code ‘FIRST25’ on your first order & up to a minimum 20% off on repeat orders! 
→ Get up to ₹400 cashback by using coupon code: MBK400 & paying via MobiKwik. 
→ Get up to ₹200 by sharing your referral code with friends & family to buy medicine & healthcare products online.  

Why Trust Truemeds With Your Daily Wellness Needs?

→ Wide Variety Of Medicines & Products:
Explore & choose from an extensive range of 2.5 lakh+ medicines & healthcare products. With our online pharmacy, you can easily buy medicine online at affordable prices & also access a wide range of healthcare products for skin, hair, sexual wellness, baby care & oral care. We not only offer branded medicines but also help you save up to 51% off with generic alternatives for branded ones. 

→ Doorstep Delivery: 
Our medicine delivery app offers quick & reliable delivery across 19,000+ pincodes, including Delhi, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Pune, Ahmedabad, Lucknow, Bangalore, Kolkata & more. Truemeds ensures that your medicines & healthcare products are delivered on time. 

→ FDA And GMP Certified Generic Substitutes: 
With our online pharmacy, you can discover FDA & GMP certified branded medicine alternates that will help you save up to 51% off on your daily medicine expenditures. Truemeds only offers generic medicines that have the exact same salt composition as their branded counterparts. All our generic medicines are sourced only from leading & reliable pharmaceutical manufacturers like Cipla, Dabur, Himalaya, GSK, Patanjali, Sugarfree, Vicks, Omron &more. 

→ Truemeds: Beyond Medicines
Truemeds is an inclusive tele-health platform where you won’t just discover a wide range of medicines but also come across essential health products like multivitamins, daily supplements, & more. From skin & hair care to baby &mom care, Truemeds offers good-quality healthcare products at affordable prices. 

→ Simplified Healthcare Management
You can also use our medical app to set monthly refill reminders for all your medicine needs. This way, you will get your monthly stock of medicines before you run out of your existing ones, ensuring that you never miss out on a dose. You can also keep a close track of your savings on monthly medicines & healthcare products. 

→ Easy 15-Day Returns
Truemeds is an E-Pharmacy that facilitates easy 15-day returns for orders that might be faulty or no longer needed. Don’t need a medicine or healthcare product any more? No problem! Enjoy a no-questions-asked return policy within 15 days of medicine delivery. 

Whether you’re struggling to manage chronic diseases or simply want to order basic healthcare products to stay on top of your health, Truemeds can be your go-to choice for whatever your needs are. 

Experience the Truemeds advantage & join millions of satisfied customers who have transformed their healthcare experience. Download the app today to avoid waiting in long queues at the medical store!

DISCLAIMER: We sell medicine at affordable rates & adopt stringent hygiene practices & safety measures with the Triple Check (TC) flow while packaging your orders. Get easy & no cost 15-day exchange or return on medicine orders.

DRiefcase is India’s 1st smart health locker and PHR (Personal Health Records) app approved by ABDM (Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission) that supports quick retrieval and sharing of digital health records.


With the DRiefcase PHR app you can:

• Retrieve medical records anytime, anywhere: Ensure that the next time the doctor asks you something about your medical history, you are able to empower him with that information in a timely manner. You will never have to worry about damaging, losing, forgetting, or finding your medical records when required.

• Organize medical records: Automatically arrange, index, and tag all your medical records on the basis of categories such as doctor’s name, type of health record, date, hospital/clinic name, etc. to retrieve any medical record in less than 10 seconds.

• Manage your family’s health documents: Create profiles of all family members within a single account to manage and keep track of family’s health documents and health history.

• Conveniently upload medical documents via Whatsapp or email: Directly upload your health records in your account by sending them on DRiefcase’s WhatsApp number +91-8080802509 or by mailing them on the dedicated email address given to each user.

• Share medical documents: Easily share your digital health documents with doctors, hospitals/clinics, diagnostic labs, TPAs, and health insurers anytime, and anywhere, and avoid carrying them around with you.

• Build medical history: Upload any type of medical documents, including prescriptions, test reports, and even X-Ray files to build a consistent and complete medical history. 

• Add reminders: Set reminders for important health events such as a visit to doctor, refilling medicines, vaccination appointment, etc.

• Become a part of ABDM (Ayushman Bharat Digital Mission): Join ABDM, India’s digital healthcare ecosystem, by creating your ABHA  (Ayushman Bharat Health Account) under ABDM, and link all your medical records to your ABHA (previously known as Health ID) to access healthcare benefits ranging from public health programmes to insurance schemes.

• Manage document sharing consent over ABDM: Give consent to movement of health data linked with your ABHA (previously known as Health ID) amongst healthcare providers.


DRiefcase is free to download and gives you unlimited storage on the cloud. There are no hidden charges. We only charge for our Premium Services.

For more information and terms of use, visit us at www.driefcase.com

Download the DRiefcase app to organize your health records and take control of your health.

Say goodbye to doubts, and say hello to India’s top doctors on Practo. Take complete care of yourself and your family from the comfort of your home - consult doctors online, book doctor appointments, order medicines online, and book diagnostic tests.

Access instant video consultation across 25+ specialties
Book hassle-free online doctor appointments
Order medicines and get them delivered to your doorstep
Get End-to-end care for Elective Surgeries
Book lab tests and get free home sample collection
Buy family health plans for unlimited online medical consultations
Read expert-written articles and tips


Online doctor consultations from the comfort of your home

Connect with doctors online and address all health concerns over a private and 100% secured video call/audio call/ chat. Post your online doctor consultation, get a digital prescription and order medicines, or book lab tests immediately.

Get started with just four simple steps:

Every doctor registered on Practo Pro (our doctors’ app) undergoes a strict onboarding and verification process. 

Get up to 40% off on medicines and health products

Order medicines online and get them delivered to your doorstep. Find more than 50k medicines, health, and wellness products on Practo’s online medicine store. Save big with discounts and offers on medicines, surgical, and other products. 

End-to-end care for elective surgeries

Expert surgical care for 50+ ailments like Hernia, Piles and Anal Fissure. Get access to experienced surgeons, advanced medical technology, personal care assistants, financial help and post-surgical support.

Practo PLUS - Unlimited online consultations across all specialities

Buy affordable health plans (1 month and 6 months) and get access to unlimited online consultations for the entire family, with doctors available 24/7.

Awards and Recognitions

Download this telemedicine app right away, & join our healthy community!

Book doctor appointments for diabetes, cancer, weight loss, hair fall, Ear, ENT problems & more. Get online medical consultations for 25+ specialities including Psychology, Physiotherapy, Gynaecology, Dermatology, Gastroenterology, Dentistry, Orthopaedics, Ayurveda, & Homeopathy.

Disclaimer for Care AI: 
This app provides general health information and is intended for informational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read in this app.

Dr Lal PathLabs – Enabling Healthier Lives

India’s leading diagnostic player with 75+ years of experience, we bring medical expertise and proficiency in the field of diagnostics. We have established a vast network of 15000+ touch points, including patient service centers and hospitals. Whether you need a routine blood test, comprehensive health checkup, or specialized pathology services, our app makes booking tests easy, fast, and reliable.

Dr Lal PathLabs offers a comprehensive diagnostic experience with a test menu of 5000+ options, covering everything from blood and urine tests to specialized screenings for diabetes, thyroid, liver, heart conditions, and cancer markers. Each sample goes through more than 50 quality checks to ensure the highest level of accuracy.  Our team of highly skilled professionals ensures the highest standard of quality and precision in every test we conduct. This makes Dr Lal PathLabs the biggest diagnostic laboratories network in India.

Buy genuine medicines, baby, nutrition, healthcare, personal care, diabetes, and other specialty products at the best prices using the MedPlus Mart App. This app provides you access to all the services provided by MedPlus pharmacies conveniently from the comfort of your home through an easy-to-use interface.

MedPlus Mart App is a comprehensive medical App where you can not only order medicines but also read important information about the medicines you take, their alternatives or substitutes, precautions, and their side effects. Medicine delivery is restricted to states where MedPlus operates, but you can order other OTC & health products, nutrition, baby care, diabetes care, and personal care products from across many regions & cities in India.

Some Key Features of the MedPlus Mart App:

- Order medicines for home delivery - Search & select the medicines you require, upload your medicine list, and tell us your delivery address. Our registered pharmacist will verify, authorize and process your order and get it delivered to your home. We deliver your medicines in most cities in 6-24 hrs and about 2-3 days in most other places.

- Order medicines for click & pick - Search & select the medicines you require, select a MedPlus store near you for pick up, and confirm the order. We will send you an SMS when the order is ready for pickup. Come to the store at a time convenient for you, show our pharmacist your medicine list, and take your medicines home. No queues and no worries about the availability of medicines.

- Assisted orders - If you are not sure how to read your medicine list or what medicines to select, just upload your prescription with the medicine list. Our customer care representative will call you and help you with the order.
In case you need any doctor's consultation you can opt for the same.

- Order general products from a comprehensive range of baby, healthcare, nutrition, personal care, diabetes care, and OTC products. Home delivery or click and pick.

- Save up to 35% on medicines with FlexiRewards - our rewards program lets you choose cash or household products on your purchases giving you flexibility and the best value for your hard-earned money.

- Search for medicine availability at a MedPlus store near you - Just select the medicine you are looking for and click a button for a list of MedPlus stores near you where the medicine is available for purchase in real-time.

- Get complete information about medicines you take including indications, adverse effects, precautions, and alternatives.

- Locate the nearest MedPlus store – The App will automatically detect your current location and help you locate the nearest store or you can locate a store by entering your locality information manually if desired.

- Keep all your health records in one place - MedPlus Mart App provides you unlimited storage to upload and keep all your health records in one place. Medicine list history and previous orders are automatically recorded and available at any time.

- Print your bills anytime - All your MedPlus bills are available in one place in the App for you to print anytime, anywhere.

- Redeem FlexiRewards points - You can view available points and redeem your points for delivery or pick up through the MedPlus Mart App.

- Set up a Pill Reminder – if you are having trouble remembering when to take your medicines, set up a pill reminder through the App for alerts on your phone reminding you to take the pill at the time it is due.

About MedPlus
MedPlus is one of India's leading and reputed pharmacy networks with over 2980+ stores in 7 states and 374 cities offering genuine medicines, superior service, and great value for money to its customers.

Healthians is India’s leading doorstep medical diagnostics service provider that brings accurate medical

tests and blood tests at home. With our user-friendly interface, you can book tests, track your reports,

helps in creating an effective action plan comprising accurate treatment and lifestyle changes. Full body
checkups are never a regret, but an investment towards a long and healthy life.

How Does it All Work?

Herbved - Ayurveda based all natural health supplements

with no artificial substitutes or chemicals, ensuring authenticity and safety.

Unique Features of Healthians App

Your health is most protected when care begins early. Redcliffe Labs helps you stay proactive with convenient at-home checkups, accurate diagnostic testing, and clear medical guidance. Trusted by 7 Million+ individuals across India, Redcliffe Labs makes it easier to understand your body, monitor changes, and take informed action without waiting for symptoms.
Redcliffe Labs operates across 220+ cities with 80+ advanced laboratories and 2000+ sample collection points. Our network is recommended by 50,000+ doctors and supervised by highly experienced MD pathologists and clinical specialists. Whether you want a full body health evaluation or a specific blood analysis, you can book everything directly from your phone.
The Redcliffe Labs app allows you to browse wellness test packages, schedule home sample collection, track your medical history, and receive your verified reports digitally. The entire experience is designed for convenience, safety, and transparency.

What You Can Do with the Redcliffe Labs App:
• Book full body and preventive health checkups from 3600+ curated wellness and condition-focused profiles

• Receive same-day verified reports monitored under multi-layer clinical validation
• Track, download, and compare historical test results to monitor changes over time
• Create and manage family profiles for your loved ones under one secure account
• Access 24x7 customer support for guidance and assistance whenever needed

Quality and Safety You Can Trust:
Your sample collection is performed by trained, certified, background-verified phlebotomists who follow strict hygiene protocols. Every sample is transported in a temperature-controlled environment and processed only in Redcliffe-owned laboratories. Our operations follow NABL-based quality systems, ensuring accuracy, reliability, and clinical integrity. Every report goes through multi-level validation involving both automated systems and expert review.
Wide Range of Diagnostic Tests and Screenings:
Redcliffe Labs offers a comprehensive menu of preventive and diagnostic evaluations including CBC blood analysis, thyroid function assessment, liver and kidney panels, lipid profile for heart health, blood sugar and diabetes monitoring, Vitamin D and B12 levels, iron and ferritin studies, electrolyte balance, inflammation indicators such as ESR and CRP, urine tests, infectious disease panels for conditions like dengue and malaria, pregnancy-related tests, and cancer-related markers. Whether your requirement is routine, condition-specific, or preventive, the app helps you choose the right test with clarity and precision.

Guidance Beyond the Report:
Your health journey does not stop at receiving your test values. Every booking includes free one-on-one consultation with healthcare experts who help explain your results in simple terms. Based on your values, lifestyle, and wellness goals, you also receive personalized recommendations along with a tailored diet plan to support long-term health improvements.

Healthcare Designed for Everyday Life:
Redcliffe Labs brings medical accuracy, transparency, and patient-first convenience together to make health monitoring simpler and stress-free. No long queues, no confusion, no delays - just dependable diagnostics designed around you.

Take charge of your wellness. Book your checkup today with Redcliffe Labs.

The FreeStyle LibreLink app is approved for use with FreeStyle Libre and FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors. You can check your glucose by scanning your sensor with your phone. Now FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensor users can get automatic glucose readings in the FreeStyle LibreLink app, updated every minute, and also receive alarms when your glucose is low or high. [1][2]

You can use the FreeStyle LibreLink app to:

* View your current glucose reading, trend arrow and glucose history
* Receive low or high glucose alarms with FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors [2]
* Add notes to track your food, insulin use and exercise
* See reports, such as Time in Range and Daily Patterns
* Share your data with your doctor and family, with your permission [3]

SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY
Compatibility may vary between phones and operating systems. Learn more about compatible phones at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

USING YOUR APP AND READER WITH THE SAME SENSOR
Alarms can only be issued on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader or your phone (not both). To receive alarms on your phone, you must start the sensor with the app. To receive alarms on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader, you must start the sensor with your reader. Once the sensor has been started with the reader, you can also scan that sensor with your phone.

Remember that the app and reader do not share data with each other. For complete information on a device, scan your sensor every eight hours with that device; otherwise, your reports will not include all your data. You can upload and view data from all of your devices on LibreView.com.

APP INFORMATION
FreeStyle LibreLink is intended for measuring glucose levels in people with diabetes when used with a sensor. For more information on how to use FreeStyle LibreLink, refer to the User’s Manual, which can be accessed through the app. If you require a printed User’s Manual, contact Abbott Diabetes Care Customer Support.

Consult a healthcare professional to confirm if this product is right for you or if you have questions about how to use this product to make treatment decisions.

Learn more at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

[1] If you are using the FreeStyle LibreLink app, you must also have access to a blood glucose monitoring system, as the app does not provide one.  

[2] Alarms that you receive do not include your glucose reading, so you must scan your sensor to check your glucose.

[3] Use of FreeStyle LibreLink and LibreLinkUp requires registration with LibreView.

The sensor housing, FreeStyle, Libre, and related brand marks are marks of Abbott. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

For additional legal notices and terms of use, go to http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

========

To resolve any technical or Customer Service issues that you are having with a FreeStyle Libre product, please contact FreeStyle Libre Customer Service directly.
